roleset.name: to add inflections, recite conjugations
roleset.note: CONJUGATE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to VN, PB, and sense groupings. No appropriate VN class. Framed by Claire. (from conjugate.01-v)

role.descr: inflection, arg1 is conjugated into the...?

example.name: With arg2, the wonder of language acquisition
example.text: For the first time she conjugated a verb to the past participle.

example.name: Typical usage
example.text: Today students conjugated the verbs querer and preferir.
